events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position and will begin our review shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Software Engineering department based on your submitted resume and cover letter.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to your application and will contact you for the next steps.
You successfully passed the initial screening interview, demonstrating strong foundational knowledge and enthusiasm for software development.
Thank you for your prompt response with availability. We appreciate your eagerness and are pleased to move forward.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 2:00 PM, where you will be assessed by senior software engineers.
You completed the technical interview with excellent problem-solving skills and coding ability as noted by the interview panel.
The HR interview has been scheduled for May 15th at 11:00 AM to discuss cultural fit, benefits, and next steps.
Your HR interview went well, with positive feedback regarding your alignment with the company culture and values.
We are excited to extend you a formal offer for the Software Engineer role, including a competitive salary and benefits package.
You have provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed enthusiasm about joining our engineering team.
You have formally accepted the offer. We look forward to welcoming you onboard and starting a great collaboration.
Your onboarding process has officially begun with an introduction to the team, systems access, and orientation materials.
The recruitment process is now closed successfully with your hire completed and all documentation finalized.
